sec.p:
By synthesizing [(η 9-C 9H 9)Ln(η 8-C 8H 8)] (Ln=Nd, Sm, Dy, Er), we unveiled a fundamental class of pure sandwich complexes. The title compounds represent a long sought asymmetric organometallic motif, leading to the observation of hysteresis loops up to 10 K. In addition, we observe fast quantum tunneling of the magnetization near zero field, which opens the possibility of nuclear spin read-out with the 167Er(III) analog of [(η 9-C 9H 9)Er(η 8-C 8H 8)]
56 . Our results clearly highlight the significance of not just a long desired and extremely elusive organometallic complex class, but are also of relevance to future quantum spintronic applications.
